Tables.​ADC_EVENT_TYPES

Table to store page item types which are supported by ADC.

Fields
cet_id

PK, alphanumerical key

cet_pti_id

Reference to PIT_TRANSLATABLE_ITEM, translatable NAME

cet_pmg_name

Part of the FK, reference to PIT_TRANSLATABLE_ITEM, criteria to group messages and translatables items per group

cet_cpitg_id

Reference to ADC_PAGE_ITEM_TYPE_GROUPS

cet_column_name

Name of the event column in the decision table.

cet_is_custom_event

Flag to indicate whether this event has to be observed explicitly by a rule action.
